name: Dragon Soul (C64)
description:
UPDATE: New Version 1.1 added to Downloads, This is some Colour change and Colour Tricks to make Green's Darker, Some Sprites had to be Changed also, Made for Real C64's, Does Flicker on LED screen using Vice Emulator and i hope it don't on Real Hardware, Let me Know if it Does, Also Updated some Sprites as i did not like some of them, Also Tile Maps/Background has had some Tweaks and more Detail added, Video of Updated Version Here:

A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Arcade Shoot em up, Fly the Dragon over the lands of Kof, Shoot everything you see, Shoot Eggs for Power Ups, Blue Egg  - Weapons, Brownish Egg - Extra Lives, Green Egg - Bonus Points, But be careful at the Maze of Vines, Touch the Vines and you Loose a Live, Good Luck and have Fun.

Made with the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Using a modified Seuck Enhancment Framework code, Original Framework code by Richard Bayliss of TND, Music by Andrew Fisher (Merman).
